Here are some of our products on offer

1

Hypergrow potting mix

This unique mix is made uD or coco coir. Derlite, ordanic compost. roounanormone, np nutrients,Donemea ,calmag and mycorrhizal that dramatically expand root development enabling plants to reed more aggressively. It is specially formulated to produce beautiful fruits, vibrant flowers & strong growth & is suitable for a wide range of plants & potting situations. Ready to use right out of the bag
